headline: What Rockwell Automation (ROK)'s New ControlLogix 5590 and ESG Partnerships Mean For Shareholders
summary: Rockwell Automation recently introduced its next-generation ControlLogix 5590 controller, featuring integrated safety and cybersecurity, alongside the announcement of an expanded ESG-focused digital collaboration with Avvale and ESGeo to enhance sustainability data reporting for industrial clients. These advances highlight Rockwell's dual commitment to operational technology innovation and helping manufacturers meet emerging environmental, social, and governance compliance requirements using...
